segments.text: IBA Bank , Business Banking Department . Ling Ming speaking . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ms Ling ! It's Mr Gwent , from Montgomery Computers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello , Mr Gwent . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some money has been sent from our Head Office in Berlin . Could you check whether you have received the remittance yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Do you know which bank it was sent through and the amount and currency ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Deutsche Bank . It was 25,000 US dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , here it is . That's received and cleared , so it's available for withdrawal .
segments.speaker: S1
